eyes: Unrevealed (as Marinette); Flaming red (as Ghost Rider)
groupaffiliation: Former partner of Baron Skullfire and leader of the Phantom Riders of the Congo
powers: It can be assumed Marinette possessed all the powers given to every Spirit of Vengeance, including shooting hellfire from her hands and mouth. Marinette also appeared to be able to control the direction of the flames as well.
significantissues: Met Blaze and prepared for war against Ketch and the Black Host (Ghost Rider #31, 2009)
Fought alongside other Ghost Riders, but Daniel Ketch eventually took her power from her (Ghost Rider #32, 2009)
Returned in Heaven when she was needed to battle Zadkiel and Kid Blackheart (Ghost Riders: Heaven’s On Fire #6, 2010)
